description: Details required by Condition 3 (Trees and Landscaping) of planning permission PP/24/07093 (Removal of non-original rear additions at garden level; erection of glazed conservatory to the rear of the closet wing at ground floor level; installation of condenser unit within acoustic enclosure at front lower ground floor lightwell; landscaping works to the rear garden; alterations at roof level to provide additional space within the loft to include a rear dormer window and rooflights to front and rear roof slopes; elevational alterations including the removal of security bars from the front, lower ground floor window; and provision of services along with internal alterations throughout)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
